Hi! I am an ecologist broadly interested in the biogeography and dispersal of microorganisms, with a special love for understanding the soil fungi and bacteria that are so integral to soil health. Relatedly, I am also fascinated by host-microbiome relationships and how these may scale up to affect ecosystem functioning. Other than my research, I enjoy exploring Coloradoâ€™s mountains every way I can, gardening native plants, crafting, and reading nerdy books.

I am a PhD candidate co-advised by [Noah Fierer](https://www.fiererlab.org) and [Julian Resasco](https://www.colorado.edu/lab/resasco/) at the University of Colorado Boulder in the Department of Ecology and Evolutionary Biology. Currently, I am also a Graduate Research Award Fellow through the [Cooperative Institute for Research in Environmental Sciences (CIRES)](https://cires.colorado.edu). My dissertation research focuses on microorganisms in the soil and near-surface atmosphere, considering physiological traits and environmental conditions including habitat fragmentation to understand the distributions of microbes at a landscape scale.

<div id="microbe" class="microbe" role="img" aria-label="wandering microbe" title="click me">
  <svg viewBox="-40 -40 80 80" width="80" height="80" aria-hidden="true">
    <!-- Body: rounded-rect capsule -->
    <g class="body">
      <rect x="-22" y="-10" width="44" height="20" rx="10" ry="10"
            fill="var(--microbe-fill, #49d3c7)" stroke="#0b5850" stroke-width="2"/>
      <!-- Eye -->
      <circle cx="8" cy="-2" r="2.4" fill="#0b0b0b"/>
      <circle cx="9" cy="-2.6" r="1" fill="#fff"/>
    </g>
    <!-- Tail (flagellum) anchored at left end (-22,0) -->
    <g class="tail">
      <path d="M -22 0
               C -26 -6, -30 -6, -34 0
               S -42  6, -46  0
               S -50 -6, -54  0"
            fill="none" stroke="#0b5850" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    </g>
  </svg>
</div>

<style>
/* Position + look */
.microbe {
  position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0;
  width: 80px; height: 80px;
  transform-origin: 50% 50%;
  z-index: 9999;          /* above page content */
  cursor: pointer;
  pointer-events: auto;   /* clickable */
  will-change: transform; /* smooth animation */
}

/* Tail wiggle */
.tail { transform-origin: -18px 0px; animation: tail-wiggle 1.2s ease-in-out infinite; }
@keyframes tail-wiggle {
  0% { transform: rotate(-10deg); }
  50% { transform: rotate(10deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(-10deg); }
}

/* Click squirm: faster wiggle + glow */
.microbe.is-squirming .tail { animation-duration: 0.35s; }
.microbe.is-squirming .body { filter: drop-shadow(0 0 6px rgba(0, 255, 200, 0.55)); }

/* Respect reduced motion */
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  .microbe { position: static; }
  .tail { animation: none !important; }
}
</style>

<script>
(() => {
  const prefersReduced = window.matchMedia && window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)').matches;
  const el = document.getElementById('microbe');
  if (!el || prefersReduced) return;

  const size = 80, half = size / 2;
  let w = window.innerWidth, h = window.innerHeight;

  // Start somewhere random-ish
  let x = Math.random() * w, y = Math.random() * h;
  let angle = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;

  const baseSpeed = 80;        // px/sec (tweak)
  let speed = baseSpeed;
  const turnRate = 1.0;        // radians/sec (tweak)
  const margin = half + 8;     // keep off edges
  let squirmUntil = 0;

  let last = performance.now();

  function frame(now) {
    const dt = Math.min(50, now - last); // cap dt to keep stable
    last = now;

    // Gentle random steering (wander)
    angle += (Math.random() - 0.5) * (turnRate * dt / 1000);
    angle += 0.25 * Math.sin(now / 1400) * (dt / 1000); // subtle periodic sway

    // Move
    const v = speed * (dt / 1000);
    x += Math.cos(angle) * v;
    y += Math.sin(angle) * v;

    // Bounce on edges
    if (x < margin) { x = margin; angle = Math.PI - angle; }
    if (x > w - margin) { x = w - margin; angle = Math.PI - angle; }
    if (y < margin) { y = margin; angle = -angle; }
    if (y > h - margin) { y = h - margin; angle = -angle; }

    // End squirm boost
    if (now > squirmUntil && speed !== baseSpeed) {
      speed = baseSpeed;
      el.classList.remove('is-squirming');
    }

    // Position & face forward (90Â° offset because SVG points right)
    el.style.transform =
      `translate3d(${(x - half).toFixed(1)}px, ${(y - half).toFixed(1)}px, 0) ` +
      `rotate(${(angle * 180 / Math.PI + 90).toFixed(1)}deg)`;

    requestAnimationFrame(frame);
  }

  requestAnimationFrame(frame);

  // Resize handling
  window.addEventListener('resize', () => { w = window.innerWidth; h = window.innerHeight; });

  // Click/tap squirm
  const squirm = () => {
    el.classList.add('is-squirming');
    speed = baseSpeed * 2.2;
    squirmUntil = performance.now() + 900; // ms
  };
  el.addEventListener('pointerdown', squirm, { passive: true });
})();
</script>
